com.simas.vc.editor

Class LabeledLinearLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.LinearLayout
          • com.simas.vc.editor.LabeledLinearLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent

    public class LabeledLinearLayout
extends android.widget.LinearLayout
    Notes: - Default orientation: VERTICAL. - This layout doesn't have any padding. If specified, it will be ignored. - Container is drawn with a hairline paint, i.e. 1px stroke.

      • calculateLabelHeight

        protected void calculateLabelHeight()
        (Re)-calculates and sets the label's height. The calculating is done for the tallest letter that can be used for the label. Currently "I". Does not re-draw the layout.

      • setPadding

        public void setPadding(int left,
              int top,
              int right,
              int bottom)
        Description copied from class: android.view.View
        Sets the padding. The view may add on the space required to display the scrollbars, depending on the style and visibility of the scrollbars. So the values returned from View.getPaddingLeft(), View.getPaddingTop(), View.getPaddingRight() and View.getPaddingBottom() may be different from the values set in this call.
        Overrides:
        setPadding in class android.view.View
        Parameters:
        left - the left padding in pixels
        top - the top padding in pixels
        right - the right padding in pixels
        bottom - the bottom padding in pixels

      • onDraw

        Description copied from class: android.view.View
        Implement this to do your drawing.
        Overrides:
        onDraw in class android.widget.LinearLayout
        Parameters:
        canvas - the canvas on which the background will be drawn
